keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The boat was discovered in the Mediterranean Sea between Libya and Italy, and 45 bodies were recovered nearby, the navy said.

headline.main: Italian Navy Saves 135 Migrants on Sinking Boat

snippet: The boat was discovered in the Mediterranean Sea between Libya and Italy, and 45 bodies were recovered nearby, the navy said.
